root: ^My teacher, %FullName:NPC:1%, keeps giving me really boring books to read at home. But %Pron:1:1% is lovely.
^Just read the books, and save %FullName:NPC:1%'s feelings.
^Tell %FullName:NPC:1%. I need to put my reading skills first!
^Switch the books myself, in secret? Save %FullName:NPC:1%'s feelings?

res1: ^I am really bored of those books now, but at least %FullName:NPC:1% doesn't know that I am. Sometimes you have to take the hit to save someone else's feelings. She's a great teacher!
^I had to read some boring books, but at least I didn't upset %FullName:NPC:1%. She's such a great teacher!
res2: ^I shouldn't have been worried! %FullName:NPC:1% was happy to help - I guess it's not that much trouble, and she seemed really happy that I have an opinion. I now have great books to read!
^Who knew? Teachers actually LIKE helping their pupils! %FullName:NPC:1% was more than happy to switch my reading books, and now I'm reading like crazy again!
res3: ^I switched the books myself! But %FullName:NPC:1% found out and told me that it messed up her system and made work. I have switched to better books, but %FullName:NPC:1% seemed put out.

^Oh dear, I messed up a bit. %FullName:NPC:1% is still the best teacher I've ever had, which is why I'm sad I made life difficult for her messing about with the reading books. At least I have better books now!
